originalText.text:
Working with EUKU Agency has bren a blast. They were able to help grow my facebook marketing campaign.

We did a lot of facebook local nyc ads to bring new customers to our site. I will continue working with them and I recommend them to other small businesses trying to grow their customer base.

originalText.text:
EUKU Agency for the past 6 months has been great. I worked exclusively with my account manager Jacky for all my Facebook ads and we also implemented Facebook retargeting ads.

We have been able to increase our budget by 20% each month.
